pages.text: Jewels can be cut in the $(l)Jewel Cutting Station$().$(br2)At the $(l)cost$() of $(l)Silver Scrap$() and $(l)Vault Bronze$(), the $(l)size$() of Jewels can be $(l)decreased$(), down to a minimum of 10.$(br2)

pages.title: Jewel Cutting Station
pages.text: By default, there is a $(l)50%$() chance at $(l)failure$(), reducing the Jewel's rarity by $(l)removing$() a $(l)modifier$().$(br2)If the Jewel is already $(l)Chipped$() at failure, it will $(l)break$() into some materials.
